documents.document: "Nothing will ever be attempted if all #possible objections must first be overcome." ~ Samuel Johnson
“Some #training days u don't feel like u have it, but u still do it, which means u got it.” via @ncjack
In dreams and in #love there are no impossibilities. -Janos Arany
In every walk with nature one receives far more than he seeks. ~ John Muir ---> experience your #run
“Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless.” ― Mother Teresa via @CharityIdeas
#Courage is the discovery that you may not win, and trying when you know you can lose.~ Tom Krause
I hope that I may always desire more than I can accomplish. Michelangelo #determination
I am fine but am in search for the Doctor who has a solution other than 'Don't run for 60 days' ~ Macon on getting injured” via @RunToWin
I hope to die in the saddle seat. ~Albert Ellis #run #live
Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at it destination full of hope. Maya Angelou #run
“The race is not always to the swift... but to those who keep on #running” via @TheTrailJogger
"One mile at a time" #run
Your #fears are not walls, but hurdles. - Millman
Each of us has a fire in our hearts for something. It's our goal in life to find it #reach #change #passion
The secret of Running is......Running via @runaddicted
"Some #hearts do not need speed training, they were just simply made to give life everything" RQ
I will #persist without exception. ~Andy Andrews
To #live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that’s all.~Oscar Wilde
"#Dreamers are not people disconnected from reality. Dreamers are people fully connected to reality's potential.” via @AffirmationSpot
"If everything seems under control, you're just not going fast enough." ~ Mario Andretti #run
"My 1st thought on my birthday 'One more year until I move into another age group!' I guess I'm a #runner." -- Karen Austin via @RunToWin
Without #ambition one starts nothing. Without work one finishes nothing. via @Kcancer
People ask, "But what if #positive thinking doesn't work?" Better to ask, "What if negative thinking does?" via @AffirmationSpot
Never stop dreaming, ever!
"You were never created to reach a certain level and then plateau. You were created to #excel.” via @coacheye
"It's not what you are that holds you back, it's what you think you are not." - Denis Waitley #run
"Find the fire in you, find what excites you, find your inner #passion AND go for it!" #run #give
#Run happy, Run strong, Run free
I believe in #can. I believe in #do. I believe in #dreams. I believe in the #impossible.
He #can who thinks he can, and he can't who thinks he can't. This is an inexorable, indisputable law. ~Pablo Picasso
"When you have the enthusiasm and the #passion, you end up figuring how to excel." Deena Kastor
Whatever you want to do, do it now. There are only so many tomorrows. ~Michael Landon #life #live #love #run
I run because they said I couldn't #Motivation @RunningQuotes via @elliall
I run to find emotional healing #whywerun via @shanda_lynn
I run because I can prove my willpower with each step. #whywerun via @marcdasharc
I run because I can't possibly think of a good reason NOT to! #whywerun via @soschlongltsrgt
I run because I CAN! #whywerun via @jimmykinney1
I run to prove that I can. #whywerun via @chicagolandrun
I run because I really like dessert! #whywerun :) via @bethinmadcity
I run because people have told me I am too big to run #whywerun via @bigluto
I run because I can't fly #whywerun via @dontslowdownyet
I run to see how far I can push myself. #whywerun via @abkills
I run because it is one of the greatest feelings in the world. #WhyWeRun via @_benzino
#whywerun i run to breathe, i run to release stress via @_just_jayr
I run because running helps me give back to others #whywerun
I love running because when I run I feel free. #whywerun via @magas_larock
I run for the love of running #whywerun
"Nothing matters except life and the love you make" — Coldplay #run #love #life #live
"People moving all the time inside a perfectly straight line. Don't you wanna just curve away? When it's such a perfect day." Coldplay #run
"if you never #try, you never know, just what you're worth" — Coldplay
“I have learned to use the word #impossible with the greatest caution.” - Wernher von Braun
But I know no matter how fast we are #running..Somehow we keep..Somehow we keep up with each other." — Dave Matthews Band
"if you give, you begin to live." — Dave Matthews Band #charity #runners
"If you're going to make it, your desire for your #dreams has to be greater than your fear of failure." via @JoshCox
"A runner must #run with dreams in his heart." - Emil Zatopek
Life is short, surround yourself with kind people. via @CharityIdeas #run #friends #charity
"#Goals are not only absolutely necessary to motivate us. They are essential to really keep us alive." -Robert Schuller
"Never underestimate the miles you run, and the people you run them with. -- via @runtowin #friends
"Take what you can from your #dreams Make them real as anything, It takes the work out of the courage" Dave Matthews Band
The only thing you can't teach in life is passion
"Fast girls have better times" -- #running shirt
“No matter how slow you are...you're still lapping everyone on the couch.” via @411Fit #run
Whether you come in first, in the middle of the pack, or last. You can say, 'I have #finished' There is a lot of satisfaction in that~Lebow
I believe the most important single thing, beyond discipline & creativity is daring to #dare. -Maya Angelou
“Train where your fitness is NOW, not where you want to be.”~ Scott Jurek #ultra #marathon
"The greatest achievement is to outperform yourself." -Denis Waitley #running #marathon
So, what's your excuse? #run
"We all have different paths to the start, but what is important is to start" #run
Winners, imagine their #dreams 1st. They want it with all their heart & expect it to come true. There's no other way to live ~Joe Montana
If you want to run, run a mile. If you want to experience a different life, #run a #marathon. Emil Zatopek
Life is meant to be lived, live it! Body is meant to be used, use it! #run #truth
Get out there
#Life is short, live it. Love is rare,grab it. Anger is bad, dump it. Fear is awful, face it. Memories are sweet, cherish it via @freakyfact
The one that finds a way will win in #life and the #run
"You can't wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club." ~Jack London #charity #run #giveback
The gun goes off and everything changes... the world changes... and nothing else really matters. ~ Patti Sue Plummer #run
"Most people would rather be certain they're miserable, than risk being happy." - Robert Anthony #change #run #happy
Favorite sign at #RnRLV "Nut up, Princess." Really helped last miles via @CGIprguy
Does 24 hours in a day control you or do you control the 24 hours in a day #getyourrunin
The trouble is, if you don't #risk anything, you risk even more. -Erica Jong
"Each one of us has a fire in our #heart for something. It's our goal in #life to find it & to keep it." Retton
Because there's no way you're not crossing the finish line. It's a misery that non-runners don't understand~ Costello #run
For the #love
Do the work. Do the analysis. But feel your run. Feel your race. Feel the #joy that is #running.~Kara Goucher
I can't imagine living and not #running ~Paula Radcliffe
Only passions, great #passions, can elevate the soul to great things. -Denis Diderot
Your purpose in #life is to find your purpose & give your whole heart and soul to it. ~Buddha
I want to do it because I want to do it.~ Amelia Earhart #run
Adventure is worthwhile in itself.~Amelia Earhart #run
"Never interrupt someone doing what you said couldn't be done."-Amelia Earhart #run
Most people have the will to #win, few have the will to prepare to win. -Bobby Knight
"To get through the hardest #journey we need take only one step at a time, but we must keep on stepping"~Chinese Proverb
Patience, persistence and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success. ~ Napoleon Hill #run
#Run, live, change, train, focus, help, care, laugh, friends
"Remember, your worst #run is always 100% better than the person who never tries." via @JoshCox
We all have #possibilities we don't know about. We can do things we don't even dream we can do. ~ Dale Carnegie
#Run after your #dreams, you don't have to accept mediocrity, you can have the stars
You can't #run away from what you really want
Being the underdog just gives #you something to work for. ~ via @iheartquotes
Others can help, but you need to be the one that says "let's go" #run
